refreshTable() - Method in class display.PopScreen
Refreshes the TableView.
registeredEndBones - Variable in class box2d.B2DJoint
Holds all references to B2DBone instances which are connected to this B2DJoint with their end.
registeredHeadBones - Variable in class box2d.B2DJoint
Holds all references to B2DBone instances which are connected to this B2DJoint with their head.
registerEndBone(B2DBone) - Method in class box2d.B2DJoint
Registers the B2DBone given as one which ends in this B2DJoint instance.
registerHeadBone(B2DBone) - Method in class box2d.B2DJoint
Registers the B2DBone given as one which originates from this B2DJoint instance.
removeProgressBar() - Method in class display.PopScreen
This method removes a TestProgressBar which had been added with setProgressBar(bar).
rereferencedClone(B2DJoint, B2DJoint) - Method in class box2d.B2DBone
Creates and returns a clone of this B2DBone instance with new references to head- and end-B2DJoints
rereferencedClone(B2DJoint, B2DBone, B2DBone) - Method in class box2d.B2DMuscle
Returns a new B2DMuscle instance with identical values for the contraction times and angles but with new references.
rereferencedMutate(B2DJoint, B2DBone, B2DBone, int) - Method in class box2d.B2DMuscle
Returns a new B2DMuscle instance with slightly varied values for the contraction times and angles but with new references.
resCam - Variable in class box2d.B2DCamera
Holds the pixel resolution of the B2DCamera.
resetPos() - Method in class box2d.B2DCamera
Resets only the position of this B2DCamera instance to the coordinates it had been initialised at.
resetPosZoom() - Method in class box2d.B2DCamera
Resets the position and zoom of this B2DCamera instance to the values it had been initialised with.
resetSpeed() - Method in class display.TestScreen
Resets the speed of the animation / physics calculations of this TestScreen instance to 1.
resetView() - Method in class display.Screen
Camera follow feature
rootPadding(BorderPane) - Static method in class display.Layout
Sets the padding for the root BorderPane of the Scene.
rotateVec2(Vec2, float) - Static method in class box2d.B2DCamera
Takes a Vec2 vector and a rotation value (in radiant) and rotates the vector by the value.
running - Variable in class display.TestScreen
running is true when the main animation is running
